alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 10:15AM CST until March 03 at 4:49AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 26.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 13.2 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 26.0 26.5 Wed 8 am CST 22.3 18.5 16.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7 PM CST.
